articles.title: Congratulations to Secretary-General of ASEAN
articles.content:
Congratulations to Secretary-General of ASEAN
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a congratulatory message on Monday to Le Luong Minh     upon his appointment as secretary-general of the Association of South East Asian Nations (ASEAN).
					 Pak in the message wished the secretary-general great success in his work, expressing his conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and ASEAN and its members would further develop in common interests.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, on the occasion of the New Year 2013.
					 The gift was conveyed to the DPRK embassy in El Djazair on December 28 last year.

articles.title: Rallies Held to Pledge to Carry out Tasks for This Year
articles.content:
Rallies Held to Pledge to Carry Out Tasks for This Year
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Workers, members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK), agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) met on Tuesday to vow to thoroughly implement the historic tasks set forth by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were officials concerned, officials of GFTUK and UAWK and workers and GFTUK members, agricultural workers and UAWK members in the city.
					
					 A meeting of workers and GFTUK members took place before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and flowers before the statues before paying tribute.
					
					 Speeches followed a report made by Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the GFTUK Central Committee.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as not only an important document indicating a path of sure victories to be followed by the Workers' Party and people of Korea but a banner of patriotism which arouses all the service personnel and people to great creations and innovations.
					
					 They renewed their resolution to tangibly contribute to bringing about a radical turn in the building of an economic power and the improvement of people's living standard this year marking the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 A meeting of agricultural workers and UAWK members was held outside the Three-Revolution Exhibition. A report made by Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the UAWK Central Committee, was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers called for decisively increasing the level of putting the agricultural production on a scientific and intensive basis and attain the goal for grain production without fail.
					
					 They called for launching a socialist emulation to bring about a turning phase for the building of an economic power by making leaping progress and innovations in agricultural production.

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged by S. Korean Regime's Confrontation Moves
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged by S. Korean Regime's Confrontation Moves
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the DPRK National Defence Commission released a statement recently to rap the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea for frantically kicking up confrontation racket from the outset of the new year.
					 The statement has kindled the DPRK people with bitter indignation at the south Korean group of traitors.
					
					 Kim U Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 "The south Korean military flamed a light atop Aegi Hill in the western sector of the front in December last year, as part of the anti-DPRK psywar. And it has persisted in confrontation and war moves against the DPRK from the outset of the new year.
					
					 The war maniacs and all other anti-reunification forces in south Korea should be aware that the Korean People's Army already declared a sacred war to wipe out the roots of confrontation and war." 
					
					 Hong Chol Hwa, director of the Law Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, said:
					
					 "Confrontation with fellow countrymen will only lead to war.
					
					 The north-south relations now stand at the crossroads of war and peace, confrontation and dialogue.
					
					 The DPRK is desirous of a peaceful and reunified, thriving nation, but it will answer those keen to start a war with a sacred war, merciless retaliation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should behave with discretion."

articles.title: DPRK Art Troupe Performs in Beijing, Tianjin
articles.content:
DPRK Art Troupe Performs in Beijing, Tianjin
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The National Folk Art Troupe of the DPRK visiting China gave performances with splendor at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing and the Opera Theatre of the Tianjin Grand Theatre on January 5 and 6.
					 The performances were appreciated by Ismail Teliwardi who is vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, officials of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Public Security, the Ministry of Transport and other fields, servicepersons of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and the Chinese People's Armed Police Force, diplomatic envoys of foreign embassies and personages of international organizations in Beijing, DPRK Ambassador to China Ji Jae Ryong and staff members of his embassy and people from all walks of life.
					
					 In Korean songs "Thinking of General" and "Ongheya for Songun Victory" and other numbers the performers truthfully represented their yearnings for leader Kim Jong Il and deep trust in the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Dances "Victory of Revolution Is Insight", "Janggo Dance" and "Dance Turning round Decorative Tassels" were acclaimed by the audience for their high ideological and artistic value and the dancers' graceful movements and refined skills.
					
					 The performers put on the stage Chinese songs such as "Fly high, Our Red Flag" and "A Good Day", giving pleasure to Chinese people.

articles.title: Coal Output on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Coal Output on Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The New Year address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un greatly encourages coal miners in the DPRK to radically increase coal output from the outset of the year.
					Ri Yong Yong, vice-minister of Coal Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's New Year address has fanned up patriotism among coal miners.
					
					 In the address, he said that innovations should be made in coal-mining and metallurgical industries for revitalization of the nation's overall economy. This mirrors his deep trust in coal miners.
					
					 The coal-mining complexes in Sunchon, Pukchang and Kaechon areas are boosting production.
					
					 Large and minor collieries in the northern part of the country are also overfulfilling their daily quota by operating the cutting and transporting equipment at full capacity.
					
					 The Tokchon Area Coal-mining Complex is directing big efforts to securing preparatory cutting faces.
					
					 The Anju and Kangdong area coal-mining complexes are increasing production by concentrating efforts in collieries with large deposits and favorable mining conditions.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Ministry of Coal Industry is paying particular attention to providing collieries across the country with face equipment, props and various kinds of accessories.

articles.title: Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, WPK's Guiding Idea
articles.content:
Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, WPK's Guiding Idea
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un said in his New Year address that the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the ever-victorious banner of the Korean revolution.
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, a great thinker and theoretician, founded the immortal Juche idea, the greatest ever in human history of ideology. The Juche idea considers the popular masses masters of the revolution and construction.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il formulated the idea as Kimilsungism, making it a guiding idea in the era of independence. And he developed the President's idea of attaching importance to military affairs into the Songun (military-first) idea.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism directly means the revolutionary ideas of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un has defined Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the guiding idea in the era of Songun. In a work released in April last year, he clarified that Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the integrated Juche system of idea, theory and method and it is the great revolutionary idea representing the era of Juche.

articles.title: Deceptive Nature of U.S. Call for Denuclearization Exposed
articles.content:
Deceptive Nature of U.S. Call for Denuclearization Exposed
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, U.S. Congress allotted 17 billion U.S. dollars for stockpiling nuclear weapons and keeping combat preparations while appropriating military expenditure for 2013. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is clear evidence that the U.S. has attempted to update nuclear weapons and use them.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the present U.S. administration's policy of nuclear weapons is quite contrary to its call for realizing a "world without nuclear weapons".
					
					 It is not hard to guess what stand the U.S. administration has toward nuclear weapons, taking it into consideration that frequent nuclear tests usually lead to updating nuclear weapons.
					
					 It is the U.S. strategic attempt to contain strategic competitors and potential rivals with a nuclear stick, hold hegemony in the military field and, on its basis, establish the sphere of domination over the world. That is why the U.S. is investing a huge amount of money in updating and maintaining nuclear weapons, and is frequently conducting nuclear tests though it holds the greatest number of nuclear warheads and carrier means in the world.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that its ambitious nuclear policy is bringing the era of worldwide arms race.
					
					 The world experienced the bitterness of the nuclear arms race during the Cold War.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop the deceptive ballad of a "world without nuclear weapons" which can convince no one and abandon its criminal nuclear ambition at once.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Earlier National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Earlier National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- All the fellow countrymen should keep Kim Jong Il's patriotism as the driving force of the struggle for national reunification and dynamically accelerate the June 15 cause, true to the idea of great national unity and unshakable will of reunification of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism is the spirit that all the fellow countrymen should display in the struggle for realizing the cause of national reunification and building a prosperous and reunified power on this land.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism represents warm love of leader Kim Jong Il for the country and nation, his self-less devotion to reunification of the country and happiness of the Koreans. It also reflects the firm fighting spirit to create a new history of a reunified power overcoming all difficulties.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should dynamically spur the June 15 era of reunification associated with the patriotic devotion of Kim Jong Il, holding fast to Kim Jong Il's patriotism as a powerful ideological and moral weapon in the present struggle for national reunification.
					
					 The historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the banner that the Korean nation should invariably hold in the struggle for national reunification.
					
					 The stand and attitude to the inter-Korean declarations serve as a touchstone distinguishing national independence from dependence upon foreign forces, reconciliation between the north and the south from confrontation and reunification from division.
					
					 Koreans have to support the inter-Korean declarations, signpost of independent reunification, and sincerely implement them. Herein lies a fundamental guarantee for independent reunification, the cherished desire of the fellow countrymen, and national prosperity.
					
					 All the Koreans living in the era of independent reunification should bear in mind that the dignity and eternal prosperity of the nation depend on themselves, and dynamically push the reunification movement, united as one under the banner of "By our nation itself", concludes the article.

articles.title: Confrontation Will Bring War Only: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Confrontation Will Bring War Only: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Confrontation with fellow countrymen sought by the south Korean Lee Myung Bak regime whose office is waning to a close is dangerous as it triggers a war, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article.
					 Confrontation will bring a war and disasters only, says the article, adding it is a token of an extreme hostile policy toward compatriots.
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by the Lee's regime is to obstruct national reconciliation and unity, do harm to fellow countrymen and realize its ambition for invading the north, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean regime's traitorous act will plunge the north-south ties into further deadlock and bring about a war in the end.
					
					 This has been proved by the 5-year office of the Lee's regime.
					
					 Though its term is about to end, the regime engrossed in confrontation with fellow countrymen is making desperate efforts to step up political and military provocations against the north.
					
					 It has increased the tension on five islands in the West Sea of Korea and their surrounding waters, calling for preserving the illegal "northern limit line".
					
					 It also labeled the north "a principal enemy" on its "white paper on defense" and incited hostility against compatriots within the military.
					
					 The south Korean regime's reckless moves compel all the Koreans to recall the lesson of history that confrontation with fellow countrymen will lead to a war.
					
					 Confrontation can not be a way out but instead will accelerate self-destruction.

articles.title: Traitor Chon Yong U's Confrontational Remarks Assailed
articles.content:
Traitor Chon Yong U's Confrontational Remarks Assailed 
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined commentary denounces Chon Yong U, chief for diplomacy and security of Chongwadae in south Korea, top servant of traitor Lee Myung Bak, for his reckless remarks of inciting confrontation. 
					 The commentary says:
					
					 Chon tried to cover up the crimes of bedeviling the north-south relations, which had promoted reconciliation, unity and cooperation, with such rhetoric as the "decision-making right for peace". He even described the deaths of innocent people and insecurity in south Korea as "contribution to peace". This shows his wrong way of thinking regarding confrontation as peace. 
					
					 He even said that peace should not be bought with money, reflection of his ignorance of the situation. It is, in essence, the total denial of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration which opened up the avenue for independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country, and big insult to the era of independent reunification when the Korean people paved the ways for peace and reunification in the spirit of "By our nation itself".
					
					 Chon said that he has become a "hard-liner" because of the north. This is a lame excuse to cover up his crimes of taking the lead in bedeviling the north-south relations as lackey of Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					 What is more despicable is that he said the next regime's "north policy will basically not be different" from theirs.
					
					 It is a poor trick to justify their anti-reunification policy of confrontation and induce the next regime to continue the policy. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak and Chon Yong U would be well advised to mind their fate destined to ruin, not the next regime's "north policy".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Its Base Act
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Its Base Act
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Recently the new Japanese government decided to postpone the application to Korean schools of tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a base and infantile act of those steeped in enmity against the DPRK and national chauvinism to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 Korean schools are attended by descendants of Koreans, who were taken to Japan and subject to death and hard work during the harsh colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					
					 In light of moral obligation the Japanese authorities have the due responsibility for guaranteeing Korean students in Japan the right to democratic national education.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries, however, are rubbing salt into the unhealed wound of the Korean people, while continuing the hostile policy toward the DPRK, far from redressing the past crimes.
					
					 Their vicious act goes against humanity and is a breach of international law as it is aimed to imbue Japanese society with the anti-DPRK sentiment and make children of Koreans victims to the unreasonable politically-motivated suppression.
					
					 No country in the world acts so disgracefully and despicably as Japan, which regards money as a means for a political bargaining.
					
					 It is Japan that went so impudent as to covet for the permanent membership of the UNSC while showing its bulgy moneybag off in the past. It is also Japan that worked hard to pull down with money a monument to sexual slavery erected in a U.S. street. That is why Japan is acting sordidly with money, regarding Korean schools as the target of its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese authorities are resorting to such base act as offering Korean schools as victims to national chauvinism, far from honestly admitting and making apology and reparation for the past wrongs. This is an act of adding new crimes to the past ones.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Cooperation and Exchange Called for
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Cooperation and Exchange Called for
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The chairman for Policy of the Committee for Promoting South-North Economic Cooperation of south Korea called for inter-Korean dialogue, cooperation and exchange without precondition, according to the south Korean Yonhap News on January 5.
					 He said that it was proved through 5 years of office of the Lee Myung Bak "government" that any promise which is premised on the "change of the north" would be meaningless.
					
					 He denounced the "government" authorities for handling everything of their own accord while defying the opinions of the participating enterprises for the south-north cooperation, greatest victims of the "May 24 step".
					
					 He went on:
					
					 It is difficult to see the possibility of the cooperation and exchange between the south and the north if the political environment goes on as now.
					
					 To put the present situation under control, the inter-Korean dialogue, cooperation and exchange should be resumed without precondition.
					
					 He demanded the authorities positively come out for the inter-Korean cooperation and exchange.

articles.title: Magazine Published by Koreans' Organization in China
articles.content:
Magazine Published by Koreans' Organization in China
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China published the December issue of its magazine "Paektu-Halla".
					 The magazine carried a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un attending a ceremony of opening the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun which was splendidly remodeled to be the sacred temple of Juche on the occasion of the first anniversary of the passing of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also carried a message of thanks Kim Jong Un sent to the service personnel and people who rendered sincere devotion to remodeling the palace.
					
					 It conveyed the accounts of colorful events -- memorial service, floral basket-laying ceremony, photo and book exhibition -- hosted by the Association and its affiliated organizations in the run-up to the first anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The magazine carried articles under captions "The great leader of our party and people Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us", "A great man and his life", "The General and CNC (10)", etc.
					
					 It conveyed news that Kim Jong Un received congratulatory letters from the Association and its affiliated organizations over the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2.
					
					 It also carried homeland and international news.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Anniversaries Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Anniversaries Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Various events took place in some countries to mark the 21st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA and the 95th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 They included Cuba, Russia, Pakistan, Nepal, Malaysia and Thailand where meetings, lectures, seminars and film shows took place from Dec. 25 to 30 last year.
					
					 Seen at the venues of the events were photos of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un on their revolutionary activities.
					
					 Put on display there were books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Arms of Korea" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation". 
					
					 The first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification said in a speech:
					
					 Kim Jong Il spent his childhood amid the flames of the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists' aggression.
					
					 He was the lodestar of reunification as he devoted his all to the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It is certain that Korea would be reunified thanks to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The general secretary of the Punjab Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Pakistan praised Kim Jong Il's undying contributions to the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence, adding his feats would remain forever in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 The chief of the Karachi Group of Youth and Students for the Study of Juche Idea in Pakistan said in a speech that the world witnessed Kim Jong Un's features as an outstanding leader and absolute defender of the sovereignty of the country and security of the people in a short period of one year after his assumption of the responsible post as the supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 He made great contributions to the national prosperity and the Songun cause always accompanying Kim Jong Il on the road of Songun revolutionary leadership, the chief added.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Pakistan.

articles.title: Ecuadorian, Peruvian Organizations Support Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Ecuadorian, Peruvian Organizations Support Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Ecuadorian and Peruvian organizations made public statements on Jan. 2 in support of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with the DPRK of Ecuador in their joint statement said Kim Jong Un's New Year Address fully encourages the Korean people in their struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and achieve national reunification under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address reviewed the achievements made by the Korean people in their drive last year and indicated the important tasks for the New Year 2013, the joint statement said, and went on:
					
					 In hearty response to his address, this year the Korean people will promote the building of an economic giant while meeting all challenges of the enemy including the imperialists and open a new phase for national reunification, life-time wish and last instructions of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people advancing holding the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in a statement said that Kim Jong Un indicated the road of sure victory of Juche Korea, great Paektusan nation in his New Year Address, adding:
					
					 His address serves as an important document indicating the road to be followed by not only service personnel and people of the DPRK but members of the Peruvian group and progressives aspiring after socialism and peace.
					
					 We fully support Kim Jong Un's New Year Address which is firmly guaranteeing the bright future of the great Paektusan nation and extend solidarity to the Korean people in the efforts to carry out the tasks advanced in the address.

articles.title: British Organizations Hail DPRK's Socialist Constitution
articles.content:
British Organizations Hail DPRK's Socialist Constitution
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on Dec. 24 last year on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK promulgated by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Noting that the DPRK Socialist Constitution is the Juche-based constitution stipulating and firmly guaranteeing the characteristics of the state and duty and rights of its citizens, the joint statement said that its promulgation amounted to a legal statement that the DPRK is an advanced socialist system free from exploitation and suppression.
					
					 It ensures the legitimate rights of the popular masses and provides a firm legal ground for fully displaying the advantages of socialism, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 Its promulgation fully encourages the progressive people striving for independence and socialism.
					
					 The Korean people have achieved greater successes in embodying the Socialist Constitution under the Songun revolutionary leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Long live the 40th anniversary of the promulgation of the DPRK Socialist Constitution!

articles.title: Canciller coreano felicita Le Luong Minh
articles.content:
Canciller coreano felicita Le Luong Minh 
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Ui Chun, envio el dia 7 un mensaje de felicitacion a Le Luong Minh por su nombramiento como secretario general de la Asociacion de Naciones del Sudeste Asiatico (Asean).
					　El remitente expresa conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Asean y los paises miembros se ampliaran y se desarrollaran conforme al interes comun y desea al destinatario mayores exitos en su labor.

articles.title: Ciudadanos de la RPDC alertan sobre la ola de enfrentamiento levantada en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Ciudadanos de la RPDC alertan sobre la ola de enfrentamiento levantada en Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- En consonancia con la recien publicada declaracion del portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los militares y civiles alertan sobre la campana conflictiva que lanza desde el principio del ano la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak.
					El oficial del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim U Chol (30 anos de edad) expreso a la ACNC como sigue:
					
					Los belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano realizaron en diciembre del ano pasado en el frente occidental la "encendida del faro de la torre de Aegibong", otra operacion de guerra psicologica anti-RPDC, e insatisfechos con esto, fomentan el clima de confrontacion y guerra desde el comienzo del Ano Nuevo.
					
					Esos moribundos y otras fuerzas anti-reunificacion del Sur de Corea deben tener presente que las fuerzas armadas de la RPDC ya han declarado la sagrada guerra para eliminar las causas de enfrentamiento y guerra.
					
					El director del Instituto de Derecho de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales Hong Chol Hwa (44 anos de edad) recalco que como ya indicado en la declaracion del portavoz del CDN, la confrontacion fratricida traera solo la guerra, y continuo:
					
					En el Ano Nuevo, las relaciones intercoreanas estan en la encrucijada de guerra o paz y de confrontacion o dialogo.
					
					Lo que desea nuestro pueblo es el Estado prospero pacifico y reunificado. Pero debemos responder con la sagrada guerra de justicia y la venganza despiadada a las acciones provocadoras de los elementos conflictivos que dicen no reparar ni en la guerra.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas tienen un poco de juicio, tendrian que tomar una opcion responsable.

articles.title: Actos de juramento de obreros y trabajadores agricolas
articles.content:
Actos de juramento de obreros y trabajadores agricolas  
						
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 8 los actos de juramento de los  miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) y de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea (UTAC).
					Asistieron a los actos los funcionarios correspondientes, los funcionarios de las organizaciones mencionadas, los obreros y gremiales y trabajadores agricolas en esta capital.
					
					Tuvo lugar el acto de los obreros y gremiales de la FGSC ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en la Casa de Creacion Mansudae.
					Los participantes rindieron el homenaje a los grandes Generalisimos tras colocar los cestos y ramitas de flores al pie de sus estatuas de bronce.
					
					El presidente del Comite Central de la FGSC, Hyon Sang Ju, presento el informe y hubo discursos.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un es la guia programatica que ilumina el camino a seguir por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo y es la bandera patriotica que llama a todos los militares y civiles a registrar grandes innovaciones y creaciones. 
					
					Y manifestaron sus decisiones de hacer aporte a producir un cambio decisivo en la construccion de la potencia economica y en el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo este ano en que se celebraran el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica y el 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					
					En el acto de los trabajadores agricolas y los miembros de UTAC realizado en la explanada frente a la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones, el presidente del Comite Central de la UTAC, Ri Myong Gil presento el informe y hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores subrayaron la necesidad de elevar decisivamente el nivel cientifico e intensivo de la produccion agricola y conquistar sin falta la meta de produccion agricola de este ano. 
					
					Llamaron a desarrollar la emulacion socialista para el aumento de la produccion para abrir la coyuntura de viraje en la construccion de la potencia economica registrando grandes saltos e innovaciones en la produccion agricola.

articles.title: Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional ofrece en China su function
articles.content:
Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional ofrece en China su funcion
						
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- El Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional de Corea, de visita en China, ofrecio los dias 5 y 6 funciones en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo de Beijing y en el Teatro de Opera del Gran Teatro de Tianjin.
					En la audiencia se distinguian el vicepresidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional de la Republica Popular China, Ismael Teliwardi, quien es el presidente del Centro Internacional de Divulgacion Cultural de China, el jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China Wang Jiarui, las personalidades de los Ministerios de Relaciones Exteriores, de Seguridad Publica, de Transporte y otros sectores, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China y la Fuerza Policiaca Armada del Pueblo de China, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y las personalidades de organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en China, el embajador Ji Jae Ryong y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica coreana en China y los trabajadores de distintos estratos de China.
					
					En las canciones coreanas "Pienso en el General",  "Ongheya de la victoria del Songun" y otras, los ejecutantes reflejaron la gran anoranza al Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien con su original direccion mediante el Songun sobre la revolucion, puso en el plano cimero la dignidad y el poderio de Corea.
					
					El baile "Veo la victoria de la revolucion" y otros folkloricos de Corea dejaron muy impresionados a los espectadores.
					
					Los artistas coreanos interpretaron tambien "Flamea alto la bandera roja", "Un buen dia" y otras canciones chinas que alegraron al publico.
